title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 43 - Motor Vehicle Lighting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 43 - Motor Vehicle Lighting

State Regulations
§ 43.1 - Vehicles subject to law
§ 43.2 - Required lighting on vehicles 80 inches or more in width
§ 43.3 - Location of required lighting on vehicles 80 inches or more in width
§ 43.4 - Required lighting of vehicles less than 80 inches in width
§ 43.5 - Location of required lighting on vehicles less than 80 inches in width
§ 43.6 - Special provisions
§ 43.7 - Approval of equipment
§ 43.8 - Candlepower and markings
§ 43.9 - Lighting requirements on agricultural equipment
§ 43.10 - Lighting requirements on special purpose commercial vehicles

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 43

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215, 375[4], 376

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
